description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. invAIders is a Shoot'em up powered by a Genetic Algorithm.  The Genetic Algorithm evolves the enemy AI based on the player's performance.  As the player gets better, so does the AI.  The question is, can you evolve faster?
description.short: invAIders is a Shoot'em up powered by a Genetic Algorithm.  The Genetic Algorithm evolves the enemy AI based on the player's performance.  As the player gets better, so does the AI.  The question is, can you evolve faster?
